title: Shield TV gets 9.0.2 update on top of Android 11 w/ fixes for controller pairing, storage notifications
content:
After a rocky start, Nvidia is improving its Android 11 update for Shield TV, and today another update is rolling out in the form of Shield Experience 9.0.2.

moreâ€¦

The post Shield TV gets 9.0.2 update on top of Android 11 w/ fixes for controller pairing, storage notifications appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: There's a new update rolling out for the Nvidia Shield TV, 9.0.2, which delivers various bug fixes on top of Android 11.
